post.text:
Our goal: to get three million Americans to register and commit to vote by November 8.

Help us get there: hrc.io/2aj1sdU

comment.author: Bryan
comment.text: Democrats vilify everyone and then they have to continue senseless wars because how are they now going to make a deal with the devil? How are they going to shoot people they gave their guns to? There is no peace electing Clinton.

replies.author: Cole
replies.text: Bryan is a fake paid foreign supporter, Don't waste your time with fakes. you'll notice a lot people are posting from foreign countries. Hillary's paying people to be fake supporters to make her look more popular than she really is. It's all a big show, Hillary is piloting a sinking ship and it's heading towards the rocks. #HillaryForPrison2016
